中継機、設置完了。\nこれからテストするね。:

やれやれ。まさかＭＧに乗ったまま配信に参加することになるとは……: Good grief. I didn't think I'd end up participating in the stream while riding MG...
それは試験の数日前のこと。ＲＳ社関係者が揃って、\nトレブルクインテットと打ち合:

Now, I'll explain the field test. The test will be divided into three parts.
We're going to explore the planned depth. Of course, there's also the possibility of a battle.
メイズ内は電波の届く範囲が限られますから、\n中継機を設置しながら進んでください:
There's a limit to how much radio waves can reach inside the maise, so...
Please proceed while setting up the relay.
ドローンが撮影したデータを転送してもらいます。: I'll have you transfer the data the drone took.
実地試験では戦闘能力はもちろん、\n継戦能力やメイズでの機動性能とか、総合的に評:
In the field test, her combat abilities were, of course,
They're all highly evaluated for their ability to fight in succession and their mobility in the Maze.
これまでの皆さんのデータをもとに制御プログラムをアップデートし、\n安全マージン:
I've updated the control program based on everyone's data so far.
You're improving your performance while leaving behind a safety margin.
あの戦闘性能評価試験での挙動に限りなく近づけたつもりです。\n手動で切ることも可:
I think I've gotten as close to what I was doing during that battle performance evaluation test as possible.
It can be manually disconnected, but... I'll leave this decision to the crime scene.
ま、そりゃそうだよね。あんな仕様で量産化できないからね。: Well, that's true. We can't mass-produce them with those specs.
あたし達のデータで、量産化仕様が研ぎ澄まされていく感じかしら。: It feels like our data is sharpening the specs for mass production.
じゃあ、ギリギリを攻めたほうが品質は高まるんでしょうか？: So would attacking at the last minute improve the quality?
理屈ではそうだけど、無理はしないでください。あくまでも開発中の\n装備です。安全:
Logically speaking, yes, but don't push yourself too hard. It's still under development.
It's equipment. No one knows if the range of the safety margin is appropriate.
実地試験は試験とはいうけど、\n実戦だし事故を起こすわけにはいかないよね。:
The field test is called an exam, but...
It's a real battle, so we can't cause an accident.
その通りだ。この試験は絶対に失敗は許されない。\n少なくとも、世間一般に見える部:
That's right. There's no way I can fail this exam.
At the very least, there shouldn't be any trouble in the parts that are visible to the general public.
そういって歩いてきたのは、初日に話をしたＲＳ社の重役だった。: The person who said that and walked over was the executive of the RSK Company I talked to on the first day.

The other day, I said something to make light of the pilots,

あはは、まあシンプルだけどその通りだね。: Ahaha. Well, it's simple, but you're right.
